  15class JoinType(Enum):
  16    """连接类型枚举"""
  17    INNER = "INNER JOIN"
  18    LEFT = "LEFT JOIN"
  19    RIGHT = "RIGHT JOIN"
  20    FULL = "FULL OUTER JOIN"  # SQLite不完全支持FULL JOIN

  23class SQLiteAdapter(DBAdapter):
  24    """SQLite数据库适配器实现"""
  25
  26    def __init__(self, db_name: str, logger: Optional[Logger] = None):
  27        """
  28        初始化SQLite适配器
  29
  30        Args:
  31            db_name: 数据库文件路径
  32            logger: 日志记录器
  33        """
  34        self.db_name = db_name
  35        self.logger = logger
  36
  37    def get_connection(self) -> sqlite3.Connection:
  38        """获取数据库连接"""
  39        try:
  40            # 启用外键约束
  41            conn = sqlite3.connect(self.db_name)
  42            conn.execute("PRAGMA foreign_keys = ON")
  43
  44            # 配置连接以返回行为字典
  45            conn.row_factory = sqlite3.Row
  46
  47            if self.logger:
  48                self.logger.debug(f"SQLite数据库连接已建立: {self.db_name}")
  49            return conn
  50        except sqlite3.Error as e:
  51            if self.logger:
  52                self.logger.error(f"SQLite连接失败: {e}")
  53            raise RuntimeError(f"SQLite数据库连接失败: {e}") from None
  54
  55    def close_connection(self, connection: sqlite3.Connection):
  56        """关闭数据库连接"""
  57        if connection:
  58            connection.close()
  59            if self.logger:
  60                self.logger.debug("SQLite数据库连接已关闭")
  61
  62    def execute_query(self, connection: sqlite3.Connection, sql: str,
  63                      params: Any = None) -> Tuple[List[Dict[str, Any]], int]:
  64        """
  65        执行查询并返回结果
  66
  67        Args:
  68            connection: 数据库连接
  69            sql: SQL语句
  70            params: 参数
  71
  72        Returns:
  73            (结果集, 影响行数)
  74        """
  75        cursor = None
  76        try:
  77            cursor = connection.cursor()
  78            cursor.execute(sql, params or ())
  79
  80            # 获取结果
  81            if cursor.description:  # SELECT查询有结果
  82                # 将结果转换为字典列表
  83                columns = [col[0] for col in cursor.description]
  84                results = []
  85                for row in cursor.fetchall():
  86                    results.append({columns[i]: row[i] for i in range(len(columns))})
  87                return results, cursor.rowcount
  88            else:
  89                # 非SELECT查询，无结果集
  90                return [], cursor.rowcount
  91        except sqlite3.Error as e:
  92            if self.logger:
  93                self.logger.error(f"执行SQL失败: {sql} | 参数: {params} | 错误: {e}")
  94            raise RuntimeError(e) from None
  95        finally:
  96            if cursor:
  97                cursor.close()
  98
  99    def get_last_insert_id(self, connection: sqlite3.Connection, table_name: str = None) -> int:
 100        """获取最后插入的ID"""
 101        cursor = None
 102        try:
 103            cursor = connection.cursor()
 104            cursor.execute("SELECT last_insert_rowid()")
 105            result = cursor.fetchone()
 106            return result[0] if result else None
 107        finally:
 108            if cursor:
 109                cursor.close()
 110
 111    def get_placeholder_style(self) -> str:
 112        """获取参数占位符样式"""
 113        return "?"

 115    @staticmethod
 116    def format_table_creation(tablename: str,
 117                              columns: Dict[str, Dict[str, str]],
 118                              primary_keys: List[str],
 119                              **kwargs) -> tuple[str, list[str]]:
 120        """
 121        格式化建表语句
 122
 123        Args:
 124            tablename: 表名
 125            columns: 列定义 {列名: {type: 类型, constraint: 约束}}
 126            primary_keys: 主键列表
 127            **kwargs: 额外参数
 128
 129        Returns:
 130            建表SQL
 131        """
 132        column_defs = []
 133        for column, details in columns.items():
 134            if isinstance(details, str):
 135                # 简单类型定义
 136                column_defs.append(f'"{column}" {details}')
 137            else:
 138                # 详细定义
 139                type_def = details.get("type", "TEXT")
 140                constraint = details.get("constraint", "")
 141                column_defs.append(f'"{column}" {type_def} {constraint}'.strip())
 142
 143        # 添加主键定义
 144        if primary_keys:
 145            pk_cols = ", ".join([f'"{pk}"' for pk in primary_keys])
 146            column_defs.append(f"PRIMARY KEY ({pk_cols})")
 147
 148        # 添加索引定义
 149        indices = kwargs.get("indices", [])
 150        foreign_keys = kwargs.get("foreign_keys", {})
 151
 152        # 添加外键约束
 153        for fk_col, fk_def in foreign_keys.items():
 154            ref_table = fk_def.get("table")
 155            ref_col = fk_def.get("column", "id")
 156            on_delete = fk_def.get("on_delete", "CASCADE")
 157            on_update = fk_def.get("on_update", "CASCADE")
 158            column_defs.append(
 159                f'FOREIGN KEY ("{fk_col}") REFERENCES "{ref_table}"("{ref_col}") '
 160                f'ON DELETE {on_delete} ON UPDATE {on_update}'
 161            )
 162
 163        # WITHOUT ROWID优化
 164        without_rowid = kwargs.get("without_rowid", False)
 165        without_rowid_clause = "WITHOUT ROWID" if without_rowid else ""
 166
 167        sql = (f'CREATE TABLE {"IF NOT EXISTS " if kwargs.get("if_not_exists", True) else ""}"{tablename}" (\n'
 168               f'  {",  ".join(column_defs)}\n'
 169               f') {without_rowid_clause}')
 170
 171        # 构建索引创建语句（SQLite中通常作为单独的语句）
 172        index_statements = []
 173        for idx in indices:
 174            if isinstance(idx, dict):
 175                idx_name = idx.get("name", f"idx_{tablename}_{'_'.join(idx.get('columns', []))}")
 176                idx_type = "UNIQUE INDEX" if idx.get("unique", False) else "INDEX"
 177                idx_cols = idx.get("columns", [])
 178                if idx_cols:
 179                    idx_cols_str = ", ".join([f'"{col}"' for col in idx_cols])
 180                    index_sql = f'CREATE {idx_type} IF NOT EXISTS "{idx_name}" ON "{tablename}"({idx_cols_str})'
 181                    index_statements.append(index_sql)
 182
 183        return sql, index_statements
 184

 186class SQLiteQueryBuilder(QueryBuilder):
 187    """SQLite查询构建器实现"""
 188
 189    def __init__(self, logger: Optional[Logger] = None):
 190        """
 191        初始化SQLite查询构建器
 192
 193        Args:
 194            logger: 日志记录器
 195        """
 196        self.logger = logger
 197
 198    @staticmethod
 199    def escape_identifier(identifier: str) -> str:
 200        """转义标识符(表名、列名)"""
 201        return f'"{identifier.replace("`", "")}"'
 202
 203    def _build_where_clause(self, conditions: Optional[Dict]) -> Tuple[str, List]:
 204        """构建WHERE子句和参数"""
 205        if not conditions:
 206            return "", []
 207
 208        where_parts = []
 209        params = []
 210
 211        # 处理逻辑组合
 212        if '$or' in conditions or '$and' in conditions:
 213            if '$or' in conditions:
 214                subclauses = []
 215                for subcond in conditions['$or']:
 216                    subwhere, subparams = self._build_where_clause(subcond)
 217                    if subwhere:
 218                        subclauses.append(f"({subwhere})")
 219                        params.extend(subparams)
 220                if subclauses:
 221                    where_parts.append(f"({' OR '.join(subclauses)})")
 222
 223            if '$and' in conditions:
 224                subclauses = []
 225                for subcond in conditions['$and']:
 226                    subwhere, subparams = self._build_where_clause(subcond)
 227                    if subwhere:
 228                        subclauses.append(f"({subwhere})")
 229                        params.extend(subparams)
 230                if subclauses:
 231                    where_parts.append(f"({' AND '.join(subclauses)})")
 232
 233            # 处理其余普通条件
 234            other_conditions = {k: v for k, v in conditions.items()
 235                                if k not in ('$or', '$and')}
 236            if other_conditions:
 237                subwhere, subparams = self._build_where_clause(other_conditions)
 238                if subwhere:
 239                    where_parts.append(subwhere)
 240                    params.extend(subparams)
 241        else:
 242            # 处理普通条件
 243            for column, value in conditions.items():
 244                # 跳过特殊键
 245                if column.startswith('$'):
 246                    continue
 247
 248                # 转义列名
 249                safe_col = self.escape_identifier(column.strip())
 250
 251                if isinstance(value, dict):
 252                    # 处理操作符条件
 253                    for op_symbol, op_value in value.items():
 254                        # 映射操作符
 255                        op_map = {
 256                            '>': '>', '<': '<', '>=': '>=', '<=': '<=',
 257                            '=': '=', '!=': '!=', '<>': '<>',
 258                            'LIKE': 'LIKE', 'NOT LIKE': 'NOT LIKE',
 259                            'IN': 'IN', 'NOT IN': 'NOT IN',
 260                            'BETWEEN': 'BETWEEN', 'NOT BETWEEN': 'NOT BETWEEN',
 261                            'IS': 'IS', 'IS NOT': 'IS NOT',
 262                            # MongoDB风格操作符
 263                            '$gt': '>', '$lt': '<', '$gte': '>=', '$lte': '<=',
 264                            '$eq': '=', '$ne': '!=',
 265                            '$like': 'LIKE', '$nlike': 'NOT LIKE',
 266                            '$in': 'IN', '$nin': 'NOT IN',
 267                            '$between': 'BETWEEN', '$nbetween': 'NOT BETWEEN',
 268                            '$is': 'IS', '$isNot': 'IS NOT',
 269                        }
 270
 271                        op = op_map.get(
 272                            op_symbol.lower() if op_symbol.startswith('$') else op_symbol
 273                        )
 274                        if not op:
 275                            raise ValueError(f"无效操作符: {op_symbol}")
 276
 277                        if op in ('BETWEEN', 'NOT BETWEEN'):
 278                            if not isinstance(op_value, (list, tuple)) or len(op_value) != 2:
 279                                raise ValueError(f"{op} 需要两个值的列表")
 280                            where_parts.append(f"{safe_col} {op} ? AND ?")
 281                            params.extend(op_value)
 282                        elif op in ('IN', 'NOT IN'):
 283                            if not isinstance(op_value, (list, tuple)):
 284                                raise ValueError(f"{op} 需要列表或元组")
 285                            placeholders = ', '.join(['?'] * len(op_value))
 286                            where_parts.append(f"{safe_col} {op} ({placeholders})")
 287                            params.extend(op_value)
 288                        elif op in ('IS', 'IS NOT'):
 289                            # IS NULL 和 IS NOT NULL 不需要参数
 290                            where_parts.append(f"{safe_col} {op} NULL"
 291                                               if op_value is None else f"{safe_col} {op} ?")
 292                            if op_value is not None:
 293                                params.append(op_value)
 294                        else:
 295                            where_parts.append(f"{safe_col} {op} ?")
 296                            params.append(op_value)
 297                else:
 298                    # 简单等值条件
 299                    if value is None:
 300                        where_parts.append(f"{safe_col} IS NULL")
 301                    else:
 302                        where_parts.append(f"{safe_col} = ?")
 303                        params.append(value)
 304
 305        return (" AND ".join(where_parts), params) if where_parts else ("", [])
 306
 307    def build_select(self,
 308                     tablename: str,
 309                     fields: Optional[List[str]] = None,
 310                     conditions: Optional[Dict] = None,
 311                     order: Optional[Dict[str, bool]] = None,
 312                     limit: Optional[int] = None,
 313                     offset: Optional[int] = None,
 314                     group_by: Optional[List[str]] = None,
 315                     having: Optional[Dict] = None,
 316                     **kwargs) -> Tuple[str, List]:
 317        """构建SELECT语句"""
 318        # 处理表名和字段
 319        safe_table = self.escape_identifier(tablename)
 320        fields_str = "*"
 321        if fields:
 322            safe_fields = [self.escape_identifier(f) for f in fields]
 323            fields_str = ", ".join(safe_fields)
 324
 325        # 基础查询
 326        sql = f"SELECT {fields_str} FROM {safe_table}"
 327        params = []
 328
 329        # 处理WHERE条件
 330        where_clause, where_params = self._build_where_clause(conditions)
 331        if where_clause:
 332            sql += f" WHERE {where_clause}"
 333            params.extend(where_params)
 334
 335        # 处理GROUP BY
 336        if group_by:
 337            group_by_fields = [self.escape_identifier(g) for g in group_by]
 338            sql += f" GROUP BY {', '.join(group_by_fields)}"
 339
 340            # 处理HAVING
 341            if having:
 342                having_clause, having_params = self._build_where_clause(having)
 343                if having_clause:
 344                    sql += f" HAVING {having_clause}"
 345                    params.extend(having_params)
 346
 347        # 处理排序
 348        if order:
 349            order_parts = []
 350            for col, asc in order.items():
 351                direction = "ASC" if asc else "DESC"
 352                order_parts.append(f"{self.escape_identifier(col)} {direction}")
 353            if order_parts:
 354                sql += f" ORDER BY {', '.join(order_parts)}"
 355
 356        # 处理分页
 357        if limit is not None:
 358            sql += f" LIMIT ?"
 359            params.append(int(limit))
 360            if offset is not None:
 361                sql += f" OFFSET ?"
 362                params.append(int(offset))
 363
 364        return sql, params
 365
 366    def build_insert(self,
 367                     tablename: str,
 368                     data: Union[Dict[str, Any], List[Dict[str, Any]]],
 369                     **kwargs) -> Tuple[str, List]:
 370        """构建INSERT语句"""
 371        safe_table = self.escape_identifier(tablename)
 372
 373        # 处理单行或多行插入
 374        is_batch = isinstance(data, list)
 375        records = data if is_batch else [data]
 376        if not records:
 377            raise ValueError("没有数据可插入")
 378
 379        # 获取所有字段名
 380        fields = list(records[0].keys())
 381        safe_fields = [self.escape_identifier(field) for field in fields]
 382        fields_str = ", ".join(safe_fields)
 383
 384        # 构建占位符
 385        values_placeholder = "(" + ", ".join(["?"] * len(fields)) + ")"
 386
 387        # 构建批量插入的值
 388        values = []
 389        for record in records:
 390            record_values = [record.get(field) for field in fields]
 391            values.extend(record_values)
 392
 393        # 处理插入选项
 394        ignore = kwargs.get("ignore", False)
 395        conflict_action = kwargs.get("conflict_action", "ABORT")
 396        conflict_columns = kwargs.get("conflict_columns", [])
 397
 398        # 构建SQL (SQLite 使用 INSERT OR 语法)
 399        if ignore:
 400            conflict_action = "IGNORE"
 401
 402        sql = f"INSERT OR {conflict_action} INTO {safe_table} ({fields_str}) VALUES "
 403
 404        if is_batch:
 405            # SQLite不支持多行语法，需要返回多个语句
 406            placeholders = []
 407            for i in range(len(records)):
 408                placeholders.append(values_placeholder)
 409
 410            sql += values_placeholder
 411
 412            # 如果是批量插入，我们需要单独处理每个INSERT
 413            # 返回单条SQL和所有值，在上层函数中处理实际的批量执行
 414
 415        else:
 416            sql += values_placeholder
 417
 418        # SQLite ON CONFLICT 子句 (类似于MySQL的ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE)
 419        if conflict_columns and kwargs.get("update_on_conflict") and not ignore:
 420            update_values = kwargs.get("update_values", {})
 421            if update_values:
 422                conflict_fields = ", ".join([self.escape_identifier(col) for col in conflict_columns])
 423                update_parts = []
 424                for field, value in update_values.items():
 425                    update_parts.append(f"{self.escape_identifier(field)} = ?")
 426                    values.append(value)
 427                sql += f" ON CONFLICT({conflict_fields}) DO UPDATE SET {', '.join(update_parts)}"
 428
 429        return sql, values
 430
 431    def build_update(self,
 432                     tablename: str,
 433                     update_values: Dict[str, Any],
 434                     conditions: Optional[Dict] = None,
 435                     **kwargs) -> Tuple[str, List]:
 436        """构建UPDATE语句"""
 437        if not update_values:
 438            raise ValueError("没有要更新的数据")
 439
 440        safe_table = self.escape_identifier(tablename)
 441
 442        # 构建SET子句
 443        set_parts = []
 444        set_params = []
 445        for field, value in update_values.items():
 446            safe_field = self.escape_identifier(field)
 447            set_parts.append(f"{safe_field} = ?")
 448            set_params.append(value)
 449
 450        # 构建WHERE子句
 451        where_clause, where_params = self._build_where_clause(conditions)
 452
 453        # 构建SQL
 454        sql = f"UPDATE {safe_table} SET {', '.join(set_parts)}"
 455        params = set_params
 456
 457        if where_clause:
 458            sql += f" WHERE {where_clause}"
 459            params.extend(where_params)
 460
 461        return sql, params
 462
 463    def build_delete(self,
 464                     tablename: str,
 465                     conditions: Optional[Dict] = None,
 466                     **kwargs) -> Tuple[str, List]:
 467        """构建DELETE语句"""
 468        safe_table = self.escape_identifier(tablename)
 469
 470        # 构建WHERE子句
 471        where_clause, where_params = self._build_where_clause(conditions)
 472
 473        # 构建SQL
 474        sql = f"DELETE FROM {safe_table}"
 475        params = []
 476
 477        if where_clause:
 478            sql += f" WHERE {where_clause}"
 479            params.extend(where_params)
 480
 481        return sql, params
 482
 483    def build_create_table(self,
 484                           tablename: str,
 485                           schema: Dict[str, Any],
 486                           primary_key: Optional[List[str]] = None,
 487                           if_not_exists: bool = True,
 488                           **kwargs) -> tuple[str, list[str]]:
 489        """构建CREATE TABLE语句"""
 490        # 验证表名
 491        if not re.match(r'^[a-zA-Z0-9_]+$', tablename):
 492            raise ValueError("表名只能包含字母、数字和下划线")
 493
 494        safe_table = self.escape_identifier(tablename)
 495
 496        # 处理列定义
 497        column_defs = []
 498        for column, details in schema.items():
 499            col_def = None
 500
 501            if isinstance(details, str):
 502                # 简单格式: {column: "INTEGER PRIMARY KEY"}
 503                col_def = f"{self.escape_identifier(column)} {details}"
 504            elif isinstance(details, dict):
 505                # 详细格式: {column: {type: "INTEGER", constraint: "PRIMARY KEY"}}
 506                col_type = details.get("type", "TEXT")
 507                constraint = details.get("constraint", "")
 508                col_def = f"{self.escape_identifier(column)} {col_type} {constraint}".strip()
 509
 510            if col_def:
 511                column_defs.append(col_def)
 512
 513        # 处理主键
 514        if primary_key:
 515            # 检查是否已经在列定义中指定了主键
 516            has_primary_key = any("PRIMARY KEY" in str(details).upper() for details in schema.values())
 517            if not has_primary_key:
 518                safe_pk = [self.escape_identifier(pk) for pk in primary_key]
 519                column_defs.append(f"PRIMARY KEY ({', '.join(safe_pk)})")
 520
 521        # 处理外键
 522        foreign_keys = kwargs.get("foreign_keys", {})
 523        for fk_col, fk_def in foreign_keys.items():
 524            ref_table = fk_def.get("table")
 525            ref_col = fk_def.get("column", "id")
 526            on_delete = fk_def.get("on_delete", "CASCADE")
 527            on_update = fk_def.get("on_update", "CASCADE")
 528            column_defs.append(
 529                f'FOREIGN KEY ({self.escape_identifier(fk_col)}) '
 530                f'REFERENCES {self.escape_identifier(ref_table)}({self.escape_identifier(ref_col)}) '
 531                f'ON DELETE {on_delete} ON UPDATE {on_update}'
 532            )
 533
 534        # 处理索引
 535        indices = []
 536        for idx in kwargs.get("indices", []):
 537            if isinstance(idx, dict):
 538                idx_name = idx.get("name", f"idx_{tablename}_{'_'.join(idx.get('columns', []))}")
 539                idx_type = "UNIQUE" if idx.get("unique", False) else ""
 540                idx_cols = [self.escape_identifier(col) for col in idx.get("columns", [])]
 541                if idx_cols:
 542                    indices.append((idx_name, idx_type, idx_cols))
 543
 544        # 其他选项
 545        without_rowid = "WITHOUT ROWID" if kwargs.get("without_rowid", False) else ""
 546
 547        # 构建最终SQL
 548        sql = (f"CREATE TABLE {f'IF NOT EXISTS ' if if_not_exists else ''}{safe_table} (\n"
 549               f"  {',  '.join(column_defs)}\n"
 550               f") {without_rowid}")
 551
 552        # SQLite不在CREATE TABLE中创建索引，需要额外的语句
 553        index_sqls = []
 554        for idx_name, idx_type, idx_cols in indices:
 555            index_sqls.append(
 556                f"CREATE {idx_type} INDEX IF NOT EXISTS {self.escape_identifier(idx_name)} "
 557                f"ON {safe_table}({', '.join(idx_cols)})"
 558            )
 559
 560        return sql, index_sqls
 561
 562    def build_drop_table(self,
 563                         tablename: str,
 564                         if_exists: bool = True) -> str:
 565        """构建DROP TABLE语句"""
 566        safe_table = self.escape_identifier(tablename)
 567        return f"DROP TABLE {f'IF EXISTS ' if if_exists else ''}{safe_table}"
 568
 569    def build_join(self,
 570                   main_table: str,
 571                   joins: List[Tuple[str, str, JoinType, Dict[str, str]]],
 572                   fields: Optional[Dict[str, List[str]]] = None,
 573                   conditions: Optional[Dict] = None,
 574                   order: Optional[Dict[str, bool]] = None,
 575                   limit: Optional[int] = None,
 576                   offset: Optional[int] = None,
 577                   **kwargs) -> Tuple[str, List]:
 578        """构建连接查询语句"""
 579        # 处理主表
 580        safe_main_table = self.escape_identifier(main_table)
 581        main_alias = kwargs.get("main_alias", "t0")
 582        from_clause = f"{safe_main_table} AS {main_alias}"
 583
 584        # 处理连接
 585        join_clauses = []
 586        join_params = []
 587        for i, (table, alias, join_type, join_conds) in enumerate(joins, 1):
 588            safe_table = self.escape_identifier(table)
 589            join_conditions = []
 590
 591            # 构建连接条件
 592            for main_col, join_col in join_conds.items():
 593                main_table_prefix = kwargs.get("main_alias", "t0")
 594                join_conditions.append(
 595                    f"{main_table_prefix}.{self.escape_identifier(main_col)} = {alias}.{self.escape_identifier(join_col)}"
 596                )
 597
 598            join_clause = f"{join_type.value} {safe_table} AS {alias} ON {' AND '.join(join_conditions)}"
 599            join_clauses.append(join_clause)
 600
 601        # 处理字段选择
 602        select_fields = []
 603        if fields:
 604            for table_alias, cols in fields.items():
 605                for col in cols:
 606                    select_fields.append(f"{table_alias}.{self.escape_identifier(col)} AS {table_alias}_{col}")
 607        else:
 608            # 默认选择所有字段
 609            select_fields.append(f"{main_alias}.*")
 610            for _, alias, _, _ in joins:
 611                select_fields.append(f"{alias}.*")
 612
 613        # 构建基础查询
 614        sql = f"SELECT {', '.join(select_fields)} FROM {from_clause} {' '.join(join_clauses)}"
 615        params = join_params.copy()
 616
 617        # 处理WHERE条件
 618        if conditions:
 619            # 需要特殊处理条件，因为它们可能引用表别名
 620            where_clause, where_params = self._build_where_clause(conditions)
 621            if where_clause:
 622                sql += f" WHERE {where_clause}"
 623                params.extend(where_params)
 624
 625        # 处理排序
 626        if order:
 627            order_parts = []
 628            for col, asc in order.items():
 629                direction = "ASC" if asc else "DESC"
 630                # 检查是否包含表别名
 631                if "." in col:
 632                    order_parts.append(f"{col} {direction}")
 633                else:
 634                    # 假设是主表字段
 635                    order_parts.append(f"{main_alias}.{self.escape_identifier(col)} {direction}")
 636
 637            if order_parts:
 638                sql += f" ORDER BY {', '.join(order_parts)}"
 639
 640        # 处理分页
 641        if limit is not None:
 642            sql += f" LIMIT ?"
 643            params.append(int(limit))
 644            if offset is not None:
 645                sql += f" OFFSET ?"
 646                params.append(int(offset))
 647
 648        return sql, params
 649
 650
 651class SQLiteop(SQLutilop):
 652    """SQLite操作工具，基于抽象框架实现"""
 653
 654    def __init__(self, db_name: str, logger: Optional[Logger] = None):
 655        """
 656        初始化SQLite操作工具
 657
 658        Args:
 659            db_name: 数据库文件路径
 660            logger: 日志记录器
 661        """
 662        # 日志配置
 663        super().__init__(logger)
 664
 665        self.db_name = db_name
 666        self.adapter = SQLiteAdapter(db_name, self.logger)
 667        self.query_builder = SQLiteQueryBuilder(self.logger)
 668
 669        self.__connection = None
 670        self.__in_transaction = False
 671        self.__selected_table = None
 672
 673        self.logger.info(f'SQLite工具初始化完成，数据库: {db_name}')
 674
 675    def _create_default_logger(self) -> Logger:
 676        """
 677        创建默认日志记录器
 678
 679        Returns:
 680            Logger: 日志记录器实例
 681        """
 682        return set_log("hzgt.sqlite", "logs")
 683
 684    def __enter__(self):
 685        """上下文管理器入口"""
 686        self.connect()
 687        return self
 688
 689    def __exit__(self, exc_type, exc_val, exc_tb):
 690        """上下文管理器出口"""
 691        if exc_type is not None:
 692            self.logger.error(f"发生异常: {exc_val}")
 693            self.rollback()
 694        elif self.__in_transaction:
 695            self.commit()
 696        self.close()
 697
 698    def connect(self):
 699        """建立数据库连接"""
 700        try:
 701            self.__connection = self.adapter.get_connection()
 702            self.logger.info(f"SQLite连接成功: {self.db_name}")
 703        except Exception as e:
 704            self.logger.error(f"连接失败: {e}")
 705            raise RuntimeError(f"数据库连接失败: {e}") from None
 706
 707    def start(self):
 708        """建立数据库连接"""
 709        self.connect()
 710
 711    def close(self):
 712        """关闭数据库连接"""
 713        if self.__connection:
 714            try:
 715                if self.__in_transaction:
 716                    self.logger.warning("关闭连接时有未提交的事务，执行回滚")
 717                    self.rollback()
 718                self.adapter.close_connection(self.__connection)
 719                self.logger.debug("SQLite连接已关闭")
 720            finally:
 721                self.__connection = None
 722
 723    def disconnect(self):
 724        """关闭数据库连接"""
 725        self.close()
 726
 727    def commit(self):
 728        """提交事务"""
 729        if self.__connection and self.__in_transaction:
 730            self.__connection.commit()
 731            self.__in_transaction = False
 732            self.logger.debug("事务已提交")
 733
 734    def rollback(self):
 735        """回滚事务"""
 736        if self.__connection and self.__in_transaction:
 737            self.__connection.rollback()
 738            self.__in_transaction = False
 739            self.logger.debug("事务已回滚")
 740
 741    def _begin_transaction(self):
 742        """开始事务"""
 743        if not self.__connection:
 744            self.connect()
 745        if not self.__in_transaction:
 746            self.__connection.execute("BEGIN")
 747            self.__in_transaction = True
 748            self.logger.debug("开始新事务")
 749
 750    def _end_transaction(self, commit: bool = True):
 751        """结束事务"""
 752        if commit:
 753            self.commit()
 754        else:
 755            self.rollback()
 756
 757    @contextmanager
 758    def transaction(self):
 759        """事务上下文管理器"""
 760        self._begin_transaction()
 761        try:
 762            yield
 763            self._end_transaction(commit=True)
 764        except Exception as e:
 765            self._end_transaction(commit=False)
 766            raise RuntimeError(e) from None
 767
 768    def execute(self, sql: str, args: Optional[Union[tuple, dict, list]] = None) -> Any:
 769        """
 770        执行SQL语句
 771
 772        Args:
 773            sql: SQL语句
 774            args: 参数
 775
 776        Returns:
 777            执行结果
 778        """
 779        if not self.__connection:
 780            self.connect()
 781
 782        try:
 783            cursor = self.__connection.cursor()
 784            try:
 785                cursor.execute(sql, args or ())
 786                if not self.__in_transaction and sql.strip().upper().startswith(('INSERT', 'UPDATE', 'DELETE')):
 787                    self.__connection.commit()
 788
 789                # 检查是否为SELECT查询有结果
 790                if cursor.description:
 791                    columns = [col[0] for col in cursor.description]
 792                    results = []
 793                    for row in cursor.fetchall():
 794                        if isinstance(row, sqlite3.Row):
 795                            results.append(dict(row))
 796                        else:
 797                            results.append({columns[i]: row[i] for i in range(len(columns))})
 798                    return results
 799                else:
 800                    return cursor.rowcount  # 返回影响行数
 801            finally:
 802                cursor.close()
 803        except sqlite3.Error as e:
 804            if not self.__in_transaction:
 805                self.__connection.rollback()
 806            self.logger.error(f"执行SQL失败: {sql} | 参数: {args} | 错误: {e}")
 807            raise RuntimeError(e) from None
 808
 809    def executemany(self, sql: str, args_list: List[Union[tuple, dict]]) -> Any:
 810        """批量执行SQL语句"""
 811        if not args_list:
 812            return None
 813
 814        if not self.__connection:
 815            self.connect()
 816
 817        try:
 818            cursor = self.__connection.cursor()
 819            try:
 820                result = cursor.executemany(sql, args_list)
 821                if not self.__in_transaction:
 822                    self.__connection.commit()
 823                return result
 824            finally:
 825                cursor.close()
 826        except sqlite3.Error as e:
 827            if not self.__in_transaction:
 828                self.__connection.rollback()
 829            self.logger.error(f"执行批量SQL失败: {sql} | 错误: {e}")
 830            raise RuntimeError(e) from None
 831
 832    def query(self, sql: str, args: Optional[Union[tuple, dict, list]] = None,
 833              bool_dict: bool = False) -> Union[List[Dict[str, Any]], Dict[str, Any]]:
 834        """
 835        执行查询并返回结果集
 836
 837        Args:
 838            sql: SQL查询语句
 839            args: 查询参数
 840            bool_dict: 返回格式为 True 字典Dict[str, Any] False 列表List[Dict[str, Any]]
 841
 842        Returns:
 843            查询结果列表，每项为一个字典
 844        """
 845        if not self.__connection:
 846            self.connect()
 847
 848        cursor = None
 849        try:
 850            cursor = self.__connection.cursor()
 851            cursor.execute(sql, args or ())
 852
 853            # 获取列名
 854            columns = [col[0] for col in cursor.description]
 855
 856            # 转换结果为字典列表
 857            results = []
 858            for row in cursor.fetchall():
 859                if isinstance(row, sqlite3.Row):
 860                    results.append(dict(row))
 861                else:
 862                    results.append({columns[i]: row[i] for i in range(len(columns))})
 863
 864            if bool_dict:
 865                if not results:
 866                    return {}
 867                return {key: [item[key] for item in results] for key in results[0]}
 868
 869            return results
 870        except sqlite3.Error as e:
 871            self.logger.error(f"执行查询失败: {sql} | 错误: {e}")
 872            raise RuntimeError(e) from None
 873        finally:
 874            if cursor:
 875                cursor.close()
 876
 877    def query_one(self, sql: str, args: Optional[Union[tuple, dict, list]] = None) -> Optional[Dict[str, Any]]:
 878        """
 879        查询单条记录
 880
 881        Args:
 882            sql: SQL查询语句
 883            args: 查询参数
 884
 885        Returns:
 886            单条记录字典，未找到时返回None
 887        """
 888        results = self.query(sql, args)
 889        return results[0] if results else None
 890
 891    # 获取所有的表名
 892    def get_tables(self) -> list[str]:
 893        return self.query("SELECT name FROM sqlite_master WHERE type='table'", bool_dict=True)["name"]
 894
 895    def select_table(self, table_name: str):
 896        """
 897        选择表
 898
 899        Args:
 900            table_name: 表名
 901        """
 902        self.__selected_table = table_name
 903        self.logger.debug(f"已记录选择表: {table_name}")
 904
 905    def table_exists(self, table_name: str) -> bool:
 906        """
 907        检查表是否存在
 908
 909        Args:
 910            table_name: 表名
 911
 912        Returns:
 913            表是否存在
 914        """
 915        result = self.query_one(
 916            "SELECT name FROM sqlite_master WHERE type='table' AND name=?",
 917            (table_name,)
 918        )
 919        return result is not None
 920
 921    def get_columns(self, table_name: str) -> List[str]:
 922        """
 923        获取表的列名列表
 924
 925        Args:
 926            table_name: 表名
 927
 928        Returns:
 929            列名列表
 930        """
 931        if not table_name:
 932            raise ValueError("未指定表名")
 933
 934        result = self.query(f"PRAGMA table_info({self._escape_identifier(table_name)})")
 935        return [row["name"] for row in result]
 936
 937    def column_exists(self, table_name: str, column_name: str) -> bool:
 938        """
 939        检查表中是否存在某列
 940
 941        Args:
 942            table_name: 表名
 943            column_name: 列名
 944
 945        Returns:
 946            列是否存在
 947        """
 948        columns = self.get_columns(table_name)
 949        return column_name in columns
 950
 951    def create_table(self, table_name: str, columns: Dict[str, str], primary_key: List[str] = None,
 952                     if_not_exists: bool = True, **kwargs):
 953        """
 954        创建表
 955
 956        Args:
 957            table_name: 表名
 958            columns: 列定义 {列名: 类型}
 959            primary_key: 主键列表
 960            if_not_exists: 是否添加IF NOT EXISTS子句
 961            **kwargs: 其他参数
 962        """
 963        if not re.match(r'^[a-zA-Z0-9_]+$', table_name):
 964            self.logger.error("表名无效，只能包含字母、数字和下划线")
 965            raise ValueError("表名只能包含字母、数字和下划线")
 966
 967        # 构建表定义
 968        sql, index_sqls = self.query_builder.build_create_table(
 969            tablename=table_name,
 970            schema=columns,
 971            primary_key=primary_key,
 972            if_not_exists=if_not_exists,
 973            **kwargs
 974        )
 975
 976        if not self.__connection:
 977            self.connect()
 978
 979        # 创建表
 980        try:
 981            with self.transaction():
 982                self.execute(sql)
 983
 984                # 创建索引
 985                for index_sql in index_sqls:
 986                    self.execute(index_sql)
 987
 988            self.logger.info(f"表 {table_name} 创建成功")
 989            self.select_table(table_name)
 990        except sqlite3.Error as e:
 991            self.logger.error(f"创建表 {table_name} 失败: {e}")
 992            raise RuntimeError(e) from None
 993
 994    def drop_table(self, table_name: str = '', if_exists: bool = True):
 995        """
 996        删除表
 997
 998        Args:
 999            table_name: 表名
1000            if_exists: 是否添加IF EXISTS子句
1001        """
1002        table_name = table_name or self.__selected_table
1003        if not table_name:
1004            raise ValueError("未指定表名")
1005
1006        sql = self.query_builder.build_drop_table(table_name, if_exists)
1007        self.execute(sql)
1008        self.logger.info(f"表 {table_name} 删除成功")
1009
1010        if table_name == self.__selected_table:
1011            self.__selected_table = None
1012
1013    def insert(self, table_name: str = '', record: Union[Dict[str, Any], List[Dict[str, Any]]] = None,
1014               return_id: bool = False, **kwargs):
1015        """
1016        插入数据
1017
1018        Args:
1019            table_name: 表名
1020            record: 记录或记录列表
1021            return_id: 是否返回插入ID
1022            **kwargs: 其他参数
1023
1024        Returns:
1025            如果return_id为True，返回插入ID
1026        """
1027        table_name = table_name or self.__selected_table
1028        if not table_name:
1029            raise ValueError("未指定表名")
1030
1031        if not record:
1032            self.logger.error("插入数据失败: record 参数不能为空")
1033            raise ValueError("record 参数不能为空")
1034
1035        # 构建SQL
1036        sql, params = self.query_builder.build_insert(
1037            tablename=table_name,
1038            data=record,
1039            **kwargs
1040        )
1041
1042        if not self.__connection:
1043            self.connect()
1044
1045        # 执行插入
1046        if isinstance(record, list):  # 批量插入
1047            rows = []
1048            for i in range(len(record)):
1049                item = record[i]
1050                values = [item.get(field) for field in record[0].keys()]
1051                rows.append(tuple(values))
1052
1053            cursor = self.__connection.cursor()
1054            try:
1055                cursor.executemany(sql, rows)
1056                if not self.__in_transaction:
1057                    self.__connection.commit()
1058                self.logger.info(f"成功批量插入 {len(rows)} 条记录到表 {table_name}")
1059
1060                if return_id:
1061                    # SQLite不支持批量插入返回ID
1062                    self.logger.warning("SQLite不支持批量插入时返回ID")
1063                    return None
1064            finally:
1065                cursor.close()
1066        else:  # 单条插入
1067            cursor = self.__connection.cursor()
1068            try:
1069                cursor.execute(sql, params)
1070                if not self.__in_transaction:
1071                    self.__connection.commit()
1072                self.logger.info(f"成功插入数据到表 {table_name}")
1073
1074                if return_id:
1075                    last_id = cursor.lastrowid
1076                    return last_id
1077            finally:
1078                cursor.close()
1079
1080        return None
1081
1082    def select(self, table_name: str = "", conditions: Dict = None,
1083               order: Dict[str, bool] = None, fields: List[str] = None,
1084               limit: int = None, offset: int = None, bool_dict: bool = False, **kwargs):
1085        """
1086        查询数据
1087
1088        Args:
1089            table_name: 表名
1090            conditions: 查询条件
1091            order: 排序条件
1092            fields: 查询字段
1093            limit: 限制记录数
1094            offset: 跳过记录数
1095            bool_dict: 返回格式为 True 字典Dict[str, Any] False 列表List[Dict[str, Any]]
1096            **kwargs: 其他参数
1097
1098        Returns:
1099            查询结果列表
1100        """
1101        table_name = table_name or self.__selected_table
1102        if not table_name:
1103            raise ValueError("未指定表名")
1104
1105        # 构建SQL
1106        sql, params = self.query_builder.build_select(
1107            tablename=table_name,
1108            fields=fields,
1109            conditions=conditions,
1110            order=order,
1111            limit=limit,
1112            offset=offset,
1113            **kwargs
1114        )
1115
1116        # 执行查询
1117        return self.query(sql, params, bool_dict)
1118
1119    def update(self, table_name: str = '', update_values: Dict[str, Any] = None,
1120               conditions: Dict = None, **kwargs):
1121        """
1122        更新数据
1123
1124        Args:
1125            table_name: 表名
1126            update_values: 更新值
1127            conditions: 更新条件
1128            **kwargs: 其他参数
1129
1130        Returns:
1131            更新的行数
1132        """
1133        table_name = table_name or self.__selected_table
1134        if not table_name:
1135            raise ValueError("未指定表名")
1136
1137        if not update_values:
1138            raise ValueError("update_values 不能为空")
1139
1140        # 构建SQL
1141        sql, params = self.query_builder.build_update(
1142            tablename=table_name,
1143            update_values=update_values,
1144            conditions=conditions,
1145            **kwargs
1146        )
1147
1148        # 执行更新
1149        return self.execute(sql, params)
1150
1151    def delete(self, table_name: str = '', conditions: Dict = None, **kwargs):
1152        """
1153        删除数据
1154
1155        Args:
1156            table_name: 表名
1157            conditions: 删除条件
1158            **kwargs: 其他参数
1159
1160        Returns:
1161            删除的行数
1162        """
1163        table_name = table_name or self.__selected_table
1164        if not table_name:
1165            raise ValueError("未指定表名")
1166
1167        # 检查危险操作
1168        if not conditions:
1169            self.logger.warning("警告: 正在执行全表删除操作!")
1170
1171        # 构建SQL
1172        sql, params = self.query_builder.build_delete(
1173            tablename=table_name,
1174            conditions=conditions,
1175            **kwargs
1176        )
1177
1178        # 执行删除
1179        return self.execute(sql, params)
1180
1181    def join(self, main_table: str, joins: List[Tuple[str, str, JoinType, Dict[str, str]]],
1182             conditions: Dict = None, fields: Dict[str, List[str]] = None,
1183             order: Dict[str, bool] = None, limit: int = None, offset: int = None,
1184             bool_dict: bool = False, **kwargs):
1185        """
1186        执行连接查询
1187
1188        Args:
1189            main_table: 主表
1190            joins: 连接定义
1191            conditions: 查询条件
1192            fields: 查询字段
1193            order: 排序条件
1194            limit: 限制记录数
1195            offset: 跳过记录数
1196            bool_dict: 返回格式为 True 字典Dict[str, Any] False 列表List[Dict[str, Any]]
1197            **kwargs: 其他参数
1198
1199        Returns:
1200            查询结果
1201        """
1202        # 构建SQL
1203        sql, params = self.query_builder.build_join(
1204            main_table=main_table,
1205            joins=joins,
1206            fields=fields,
1207            conditions=conditions,
1208            order=order,
1209            limit=limit,
1210            offset=offset,
1211            **kwargs
1212        )
1213
1214        # 执行查询
1215        return self.query(sql, params, bool_dict)
1216
1217    def batch_insert(self, table_name: str, records: List[Dict[str, Any]],
1218                     batch_size: int = 1000, **kwargs):
1219        """
1220        批量插入数据
1221
1222        Args:
1223            table_name: 表名
1224            records: 记录列表
1225            batch_size: 每批大小
1226            **kwargs: 其他参数
1227
1228        Returns:
1229            插入的记录数
1230        """
1231        if not records:
1232            return 0
1233
1234        table_name = table_name or self.__selected_table
1235        if not table_name:
1236            raise ValueError("未指定表名")
1237
1238        total = 0
1239        for i in range(0, len(records), batch_size):
1240            batch = records[i:i + batch_size]
1241            self.insert(table_name, batch, **kwargs)
1242            total += len(batch)
1243
1244        return total
1245
1246    def _escape_identifier(self, identifier: str) -> str:
1247        """
1248        转义标识符
1249
1250        Args:
1251            identifier: 标识符
1252
1253        Returns:
1254            转义后的标识符
1255        """
1256        return self.query_builder.escape_identifier(identifier)
1257
1258    # -------- 原有SQLiteop特有方法 --------
1259
1260    def start(self):
1261        """连接到数据库（保持与原接口兼容）"""
1262        self.connect()
1263
1264    def enable_wal_mode(self) -> None:
1265        """
1266        启用 WAL 模式（Write-Ahead Logging）, 提高并发性能.
1267        """
1268        try:
1269            self.execute("PRAGMA journal_mode=WAL")
1270            self.logger.info("已启用 WAL 模式")
1271        except sqlite3.Error as e:
1272            self.logger.error(f"启用 WAL 模式失败: {e}")
1273            raise RuntimeError(e) from None
1274
1275    def migrate_db(self, table_name: str, new_columns: Dict[str, str]) -> None:
1276        """
1277        数据库迁移: 添加新列.
1278
1279        Args:
1280            table_name: 表名
1281            new_columns: 新列名和类型的字典
1282        """
1283        try:
1284            for col, dtype in new_columns.items():
1285                if not self.column_exists(table_name, col):
1286                    self.execute(f"ALTER TABLE {self._escape_identifier(table_name)} ADD COLUMN {col} {dtype}")
1287                    self.logger.info(f"已添加列 {col} 到表 {table_name}")
1288            if not self.__in_transaction:
1289                self.__connection.commit()
1290        except sqlite3.Error as e:
1291            self.logger.error(f"数据库迁移失败: {e}")
1292            raise RuntimeError(e) from None
1293
1294    def export_to_csv(self, table_name: str, csv_path: str) -> None:
1295        """
1296        将表数据导出到 CSV 文件.
1297
1298        Args:
1299            table_name: 表名
1300            csv_path: CSV 文件路径
1301        """
1302        try:
1303            rows = self.select(table_name)
1304
1305            if not rows:
1306                self.logger.warning(f"表 {table_name} 没有数据可导出")
1307                return
1308
1309            columns = list(rows[0].keys())
1310
1311            with open(csv_path, 'w', newline='') as f:
1312                writer = csv.writer(f)
1313                writer.writerow(columns)  # 写入列名
1314                for row in rows:
1315                    writer.writerow([row[col] for col in columns])  # 写入数据
1316            self.logger.info(f"数据已导出到 {csv_path}")
1317        except Exception as e:
1318            self.logger.error(f"导出数据失败: {e}")
1319            raise RuntimeError(e) from None
1320
1321    def import_from_csv(self, table_name: str, csv_path: str) -> None:
1322        """
1323        从 CSV 文件导入数据到表.
1324
1325        Args:
1326            table_name: 表名
1327            csv_path: CSV 文件路径
1328        """
1329        try:
1330            with open(csv_path, 'r') as f:
1331                reader = csv.reader(f)
1332                columns = next(reader)  # 读取列名
1333
1334                # 验证列是否存在于表中
1335                table_columns = self.get_columns(table_name)
1336                for col in columns:
1337                    if col not in table_columns:
1338                        raise ValueError(f"列 '{col}' 不存在于表 {table_name}")
1339
1340                records = []
1341                for row in reader:
1342                    record = {columns[i]: row[i] for i in range(len(columns))}
1343                    records.append(record)
1344
1345            if records:
1346                self.batch_insert(table_name, records)
1347
1348            self.logger.info(f"数据已从 {csv_path} 导入到 {table_name}")
1349        except Exception as e:
1350            self.logger.error(f"导入数据失败: {e}")
1351            raise RuntimeError(e) from None
1352
1353    def execute_sql_script(self, script_path: str) -> None:
1354        """
1355        执行 SQL 脚本文件.
1356
1357        Args:
1358            script_path: SQL 脚本文件路径
1359        """
1360        try:
1361            with open(script_path, 'r') as f:
1362                sql_script = f.read()
1363
1364            if not self.__connection:
1365                self.connect()
1366
1367            self.__connection.executescript(sql_script)
1368            if not self.__in_transaction:
1369                self.__connection.commit()
1370
1371            self.logger.info(f"已执行 SQL 脚本: {script_path}")
1372        except Exception as e:
1373            self.logger.error(f"执行 SQL 脚本失败: {e}")
1374            raise RuntimeError(e) from None
1375
1376    def backup_db(self, target_db: str) -> None:
1377        """
1378        备份数据库.
1379
1380        Args:
1381            target_db: 目标数据库文件名
1382        """
1383        if not self.__connection:
1384            self.connect()
1385
1386        try:
1387            target_conn = sqlite3.connect(target_db)
1388            with target_conn:
1389                self.__connection.backup(target_conn)
1390            target_conn.close()
1391            self.logger.info(f"数据库已备份到 {target_db}")
1392        except sqlite3.Error as e:
1393            self.logger.error(f"备份数据库失败: {e}")
1394            raise RuntimeError(e) from None

class SQLiteAdapter(typing.Generic[~T], abc.ABC): 
 24class SQLiteAdapter(DBAdapter):
 25    """SQLite数据库适配器实现"""
 26
 27    def __init__(self, db_name: str, logger: Optional[Logger] = None):
 28        """
 29        初始化SQLite适配器
 30
 31        Args:
 32            db_name: 数据库文件路径
 33            logger: 日志记录器
 34        """
 35        self.db_name = db_name
 36        self.logger = logger
 37
 38    def get_connection(self) -> sqlite3.Connection:
 39        """获取数据库连接"""
 40        try:
 41            # 启用外键约束
 42            conn = sqlite3.connect(self.db_name)
 43            conn.execute("PRAGMA foreign_keys = ON")
 44
 45            # 配置连接以返回行为字典
 46            conn.row_factory = sqlite3.Row
 47
 48            if self.logger:
 49                self.logger.debug(f"SQLite数据库连接已建立: {self.db_name}")
 50            return conn
 51        except sqlite3.Error as e:
 52            if self.logger:
 53                self.logger.error(f"SQLite连接失败: {e}")
 54            raise RuntimeError(f"SQLite数据库连接失败: {e}") from None
 55
 56    def close_connection(self, connection: sqlite3.Connection):
 57        """关闭数据库连接"""
 58        if connection:
 59            connection.close()
 60            if self.logger:
 61                self.logger.debug("SQLite数据库连接已关闭")
 62
 63    def execute_query(self, connection: sqlite3.Connection, sql: str,
 64                      params: Any = None) -> Tuple[List[Dict[str, Any]], int]:
 65        """
 66        执行查询并返回结果
 67
 68        Args:
 69            connection: 数据库连接
 70            sql: SQL语句
 71            params: 参数
 72
 73        Returns:
 74            (结果集, 影响行数)
 75        """
 76        cursor = None
 77        try:
 78            cursor = connection.cursor()
 79            cursor.execute(sql, params or ())
 80
 81            # 获取结果
 82            if cursor.description:  # SELECT查询有结果
 83                # 将结果转换为字典列表
 84                columns = [col[0] for col in cursor.description]
 85                results = []
 86                for row in cursor.fetchall():
 87                    results.append({columns[i]: row[i] for i in range(len(columns))})
 88                return results, cursor.rowcount
 89            else:
 90                # 非SELECT查询，无结果集
 91                return [], cursor.rowcount
 92        except sqlite3.Error as e:
 93            if self.logger:
 94                self.logger.error(f"执行SQL失败: {sql} | 参数: {params} | 错误: {e}")
 95            raise RuntimeError(e) from None
 96        finally:
 97            if cursor:
 98                cursor.close()
 99
100    def get_last_insert_id(self, connection: sqlite3.Connection, table_name: str = None) -> int:
101        """获取最后插入的ID"""
102        cursor = None
103        try:
104            cursor = connection.cursor()
105            cursor.execute("SELECT last_insert_rowid()")
106            result = cursor.fetchone()
107            return result[0] if result else None
108        finally:
109            if cursor:
110                cursor.close()
111
112    def get_placeholder_style(self) -> str:
113        """获取参数占位符样式"""
114        return "?"
115
116    @staticmethod
117    def format_table_creation(tablename: str,
118                              columns: Dict[str, Dict[str, str]],
119                              primary_keys: List[str],
120                              **kwargs) -> tuple[str, list[str]]:
121        """
122        格式化建表语句
123
124        Args:
125            tablename: 表名
126            columns: 列定义 {列名: {type: 类型, constraint: 约束}}
127            primary_keys: 主键列表
128            **kwargs: 额外参数
129
130        Returns:
131            建表SQL
132        """
133        column_defs = []
134        for column, details in columns.items():
135            if isinstance(details, str):
136                # 简单类型定义
137                column_defs.append(f'"{column}" {details}')
138            else:
139                # 详细定义
140                type_def = details.get("type", "TEXT")
141                constraint = details.get("constraint", "")
142                column_defs.append(f'"{column}" {type_def} {constraint}'.strip())
143
144        # 添加主键定义
145        if primary_keys:
146            pk_cols = ", ".join([f'"{pk}"' for pk in primary_keys])
147            column_defs.append(f"PRIMARY KEY ({pk_cols})")
148
149        # 添加索引定义
150        indices = kwargs.get("indices", [])
151        foreign_keys = kwargs.get("foreign_keys", {})
152
153        # 添加外键约束
154        for fk_col, fk_def in foreign_keys.items():
155            ref_table = fk_def.get("table")
156            ref_col = fk_def.get("column", "id")
157            on_delete = fk_def.get("on_delete", "CASCADE")
158            on_update = fk_def.get("on_update", "CASCADE")
159            column_defs.append(
160                f'FOREIGN KEY ("{fk_col}") REFERENCES "{ref_table}"("{ref_col}") '
161                f'ON DELETE {on_delete} ON UPDATE {on_update}'
162            )
163
164        # WITHOUT ROWID优化
165        without_rowid = kwargs.get("without_rowid", False)
166        without_rowid_clause = "WITHOUT ROWID" if without_rowid else ""
167
168        sql = (f'CREATE TABLE {"IF NOT EXISTS " if kwargs.get("if_not_exists", True) else ""}"{tablename}" (\n'
169               f'  {",  ".join(column_defs)}\n'
170               f') {without_rowid_clause}')
171
172        # 构建索引创建语句（SQLite中通常作为单独的语句）
173        index_statements = []
174        for idx in indices:
175            if isinstance(idx, dict):
176                idx_name = idx.get("name", f"idx_{tablename}_{'_'.join(idx.get('columns', []))}")
177                idx_type = "UNIQUE INDEX" if idx.get("unique", False) else "INDEX"
178                idx_cols = idx.get("columns", [])
179                if idx_cols:
180                    idx_cols_str = ", ".join([f'"{col}"' for col in idx_cols])
181                    index_sql = f'CREATE {idx_type} IF NOT EXISTS "{idx_name}" ON "{tablename}"({idx_cols_str})'
182                    index_statements.append(index_sql)
183
184        return sql, index_statements

class SQLiteQueryBuilder(hzgt.tools.SQL.sqlcore.SQLutil.QueryBuilder): 
187class SQLiteQueryBuilder(QueryBuilder):
188    """SQLite查询构建器实现"""
189
190    def __init__(self, logger: Optional[Logger] = None):
191        """
192        初始化SQLite查询构建器
193
194        Args:
195            logger: 日志记录器
196        """
197        self.logger = logger
198
199    @staticmethod
200    def escape_identifier(identifier: str) -> str:
201        """转义标识符(表名、列名)"""
202        return f'"{identifier.replace("`", "")}"'
203
204    def _build_where_clause(self, conditions: Optional[Dict]) -> Tuple[str, List]:
205        """构建WHERE子句和参数"""
206        if not conditions:
207            return "", []
208
209        where_parts = []
210        params = []
211
212        # 处理逻辑组合
213        if '$or' in conditions or '$and' in conditions:
214            if '$or' in conditions:
215                subclauses = []
216                for subcond in conditions['$or']:
217                    subwhere, subparams = self._build_where_clause(subcond)
218                    if subwhere:
219                        subclauses.append(f"({subwhere})")
220                        params.extend(subparams)
221                if subclauses:
222                    where_parts.append(f"({' OR '.join(subclauses)})")
223
224            if '$and' in conditions:
225                subclauses = []
226                for subcond in conditions['$and']:
227                    subwhere, subparams = self._build_where_clause(subcond)
228                    if subwhere:
229                        subclauses.append(f"({subwhere})")
230                        params.extend(subparams)
231                if subclauses:
232                    where_parts.append(f"({' AND '.join(subclauses)})")
233
234            # 处理其余普通条件
235            other_conditions = {k: v for k, v in conditions.items()
236                                if k not in ('$or', '$and')}
237            if other_conditions:
238                subwhere, subparams = self._build_where_clause(other_conditions)
239                if subwhere:
240                    where_parts.append(subwhere)
241                    params.extend(subparams)
242        else:
243            # 处理普通条件
244            for column, value in conditions.items():
245                # 跳过特殊键
246                if column.startswith('$'):
247                    continue
248
249                # 转义列名
250                safe_col = self.escape_identifier(column.strip())
251
252                if isinstance(value, dict):
253                    # 处理操作符条件
254                    for op_symbol, op_value in value.items():
255                        # 映射操作符
256                        op_map = {
257                            '>': '>', '<': '<', '>=': '>=', '<=': '<=',
258                            '=': '=', '!=': '!=', '<>': '<>',
259                            'LIKE': 'LIKE', 'NOT LIKE': 'NOT LIKE',
260                            'IN': 'IN', 'NOT IN': 'NOT IN',
261                            'BETWEEN': 'BETWEEN', 'NOT BETWEEN': 'NOT BETWEEN',
262                            'IS': 'IS', 'IS NOT': 'IS NOT',
263                            # MongoDB风格操作符
264                            '$gt': '>', '$lt': '<', '$gte': '>=', '$lte': '<=',
265                            '$eq': '=', '$ne': '!=',
266                            '$like': 'LIKE', '$nlike': 'NOT LIKE',
267                            '$in': 'IN', '$nin': 'NOT IN',
268                            '$between': 'BETWEEN', '$nbetween': 'NOT BETWEEN',
269                            '$is': 'IS', '$isNot': 'IS NOT',
270                        }
271
272                        op = op_map.get(
273                            op_symbol.lower() if op_symbol.startswith('$') else op_symbol
274                        )
275                        if not op:
276                            raise ValueError(f"无效操作符: {op_symbol}")
277
278                        if op in ('BETWEEN', 'NOT BETWEEN'):
279                            if not isinstance(op_value, (list, tuple)) or len(op_value) != 2:
280                                raise ValueError(f"{op} 需要两个值的列表")
281                            where_parts.append(f"{safe_col} {op} ? AND ?")
282                            params.extend(op_value)
283                        elif op in ('IN', 'NOT IN'):
284                            if not isinstance(op_value, (list, tuple)):
285                                raise ValueError(f"{op} 需要列表或元组")
286                            placeholders = ', '.join(['?'] * len(op_value))
287                            where_parts.append(f"{safe_col} {op} ({placeholders})")
288                            params.extend(op_value)
289                        elif op in ('IS', 'IS NOT'):
290                            # IS NULL 和 IS NOT NULL 不需要参数
291                            where_parts.append(f"{safe_col} {op} NULL"
292                                               if op_value is None else f"{safe_col} {op} ?")
293                            if op_value is not None:
294                                params.append(op_value)
295                        else:
296                            where_parts.append(f"{safe_col} {op} ?")
297                            params.append(op_value)
298                else:
299                    # 简单等值条件
300                    if value is None:
301                        where_parts.append(f"{safe_col} IS NULL")
302                    else:
303                        where_parts.append(f"{safe_col} = ?")
304                        params.append(value)
305
306        return (" AND ".join(where_parts), params) if where_parts else ("", [])
307
308    def build_select(self,
309                     tablename: str,
310                     fields: Optional[List[str]] = None,
311                     conditions: Optional[Dict] = None,
312                     order: Optional[Dict[str, bool]] = None,
313                     limit: Optional[int] = None,
314                     offset: Optional[int] = None,
315                     group_by: Optional[List[str]] = None,
316                     having: Optional[Dict] = None,
317                     **kwargs) -> Tuple[str, List]:
318        """构建SELECT语句"""
319        # 处理表名和字段
320        safe_table = self.escape_identifier(tablename)
321        fields_str = "*"
322        if fields:
323            safe_fields = [self.escape_identifier(f) for f in fields]
324            fields_str = ", ".join(safe_fields)
325
326        # 基础查询
327        sql = f"SELECT {fields_str} FROM {safe_table}"
328        params = []
329
330        # 处理WHERE条件
331        where_clause, where_params = self._build_where_clause(conditions)
332        if where_clause:
333            sql += f" WHERE {where_clause}"
334            params.extend(where_params)
335
336        # 处理GROUP BY
337        if group_by:
338            group_by_fields = [self.escape_identifier(g) for g in group_by]
339            sql += f" GROUP BY {', '.join(group_by_fields)}"
340
341            # 处理HAVING
342            if having:
343                having_clause, having_params = self._build_where_clause(having)
344                if having_clause:
345                    sql += f" HAVING {having_clause}"
346                    params.extend(having_params)
347
348        # 处理排序
349        if order:
350            order_parts = []
351            for col, asc in order.items():
352                direction = "ASC" if asc else "DESC"
353                order_parts.append(f"{self.escape_identifier(col)} {direction}")
354            if order_parts:
355                sql += f" ORDER BY {', '.join(order_parts)}"
356
357        # 处理分页
358        if limit is not None:
359            sql += f" LIMIT ?"
360            params.append(int(limit))
361            if offset is not None:
362                sql += f" OFFSET ?"
363                params.append(int(offset))
364
365        return sql, params
366
367    def build_insert(self,
368                     tablename: str,
369                     data: Union[Dict[str, Any], List[Dict[str, Any]]],
370                     **kwargs) -> Tuple[str, List]:
371        """构建INSERT语句"""
372        safe_table = self.escape_identifier(tablename)
373
374        # 处理单行或多行插入
375        is_batch = isinstance(data, list)
376        records = data if is_batch else [data]
377        if not records:
378            raise ValueError("没有数据可插入")
379
380        # 获取所有字段名
381        fields = list(records[0].keys())
382        safe_fields = [self.escape_identifier(field) for field in fields]
383        fields_str = ", ".join(safe_fields)
384
385        # 构建占位符
386        values_placeholder = "(" + ", ".join(["?"] * len(fields)) + ")"
387
388        # 构建批量插入的值
389        values = []
390        for record in records:
391            record_values = [record.get(field) for field in fields]
392            values.extend(record_values)
393
394        # 处理插入选项
395        ignore = kwargs.get("ignore", False)
396        conflict_action = kwargs.get("conflict_action", "ABORT")
397        conflict_columns = kwargs.get("conflict_columns", [])
398
399        # 构建SQL (SQLite 使用 INSERT OR 语法)
400        if ignore:
401            conflict_action = "IGNORE"
402
403        sql = f"INSERT OR {conflict_action} INTO {safe_table} ({fields_str}) VALUES "
404
405        if is_batch:
406            # SQLite不支持多行语法，需要返回多个语句
407            placeholders = []
408            for i in range(len(records)):
409                placeholders.append(values_placeholder)
410
411            sql += values_placeholder
412
413            # 如果是批量插入，我们需要单独处理每个INSERT
414            # 返回单条SQL和所有值，在上层函数中处理实际的批量执行
415
416        else:
417            sql += values_placeholder
418
419        # SQLite ON CONFLICT 子句 (类似于MySQL的ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE)
420        if conflict_columns and kwargs.get("update_on_conflict") and not ignore:
421            update_values = kwargs.get("update_values", {})
422            if update_values:
423                conflict_fields = ", ".join([self.escape_identifier(col) for col in conflict_columns])
424                update_parts = []
425                for field, value in update_values.items():
426                    update_parts.append(f"{self.escape_identifier(field)} = ?")
427                    values.append(value)
428                sql += f" ON CONFLICT({conflict_fields}) DO UPDATE SET {', '.join(update_parts)}"
429
430        return sql, values
431
432    def build_update(self,
433                     tablename: str,
434                     update_values: Dict[str, Any],
435                     conditions: Optional[Dict] = None,
436                     **kwargs) -> Tuple[str, List]:
437        """构建UPDATE语句"""
438        if not update_values:
439            raise ValueError("没有要更新的数据")
440
441        safe_table = self.escape_identifier(tablename)
442
443        # 构建SET子句
444        set_parts = []
445        set_params = []
446        for field, value in update_values.items():
447            safe_field = self.escape_identifier(field)
448            set_parts.append(f"{safe_field} = ?")
449            set_params.append(value)
450
451        # 构建WHERE子句
452        where_clause, where_params = self._build_where_clause(conditions)
453
454        # 构建SQL
455        sql = f"UPDATE {safe_table} SET {', '.join(set_parts)}"
456        params = set_params
457
458        if where_clause:
459            sql += f" WHERE {where_clause}"
460            params.extend(where_params)
461
462        return sql, params
463
464    def build_delete(self,
465                     tablename: str,
466                     conditions: Optional[Dict] = None,
467                     **kwargs) -> Tuple[str, List]:
468        """构建DELETE语句"""
469        safe_table = self.escape_identifier(tablename)
470
471        # 构建WHERE子句
472        where_clause, where_params = self._build_where_clause(conditions)
473
474        # 构建SQL
475        sql = f"DELETE FROM {safe_table}"
476        params = []
477
478        if where_clause:
479            sql += f" WHERE {where_clause}"
480            params.extend(where_params)
481
482        return sql, params
483
484    def build_create_table(self,
485                           tablename: str,
486                           schema: Dict[str, Any],
487                           primary_key: Optional[List[str]] = None,
488                           if_not_exists: bool = True,
489                           **kwargs) -> tuple[str, list[str]]:
490        """构建CREATE TABLE语句"""
491        # 验证表名
492        if not re.match(r'^[a-zA-Z0-9_]+$', tablename):
493            raise ValueError("表名只能包含字母、数字和下划线")
494
495        safe_table = self.escape_identifier(tablename)
496
497        # 处理列定义
498        column_defs = []
499        for column, details in schema.items():
500            col_def = None
501
502            if isinstance(details, str):
503                # 简单格式: {column: "INTEGER PRIMARY KEY"}
504                col_def = f"{self.escape_identifier(column)} {details}"
505            elif isinstance(details, dict):
506                # 详细格式: {column: {type: "INTEGER", constraint: "PRIMARY KEY"}}
507                col_type = details.get("type", "TEXT")
508                constraint = details.get("constraint", "")
509                col_def = f"{self.escape_identifier(column)} {col_type} {constraint}".strip()
510
511            if col_def:
512                column_defs.append(col_def)
513
514        # 处理主键
515        if primary_key:
516            # 检查是否已经在列定义中指定了主键
517            has_primary_key = any("PRIMARY KEY" in str(details).upper() for details in schema.values())
518            if not has_primary_key:
519                safe_pk = [self.escape_identifier(pk) for pk in primary_key]
520                column_defs.append(f"PRIMARY KEY ({', '.join(safe_pk)})")
521
522        # 处理外键
523        foreign_keys = kwargs.get("foreign_keys", {})
524        for fk_col, fk_def in foreign_keys.items():
525            ref_table = fk_def.get("table")
526            ref_col = fk_def.get("column", "id")
527            on_delete = fk_def.get("on_delete", "CASCADE")
528            on_update = fk_def.get("on_update", "CASCADE")
529            column_defs.append(
530                f'FOREIGN KEY ({self.escape_identifier(fk_col)}) '
531                f'REFERENCES {self.escape_identifier(ref_table)}({self.escape_identifier(ref_col)}) '
532                f'ON DELETE {on_delete} ON UPDATE {on_update}'
533            )
534
535        # 处理索引
536        indices = []
537        for idx in kwargs.get("indices", []):
538            if isinstance(idx, dict):
539                idx_name = idx.get("name", f"idx_{tablename}_{'_'.join(idx.get('columns', []))}")
540                idx_type = "UNIQUE" if idx.get("unique", False) else ""
541                idx_cols = [self.escape_identifier(col) for col in idx.get("columns", [])]
542                if idx_cols:
543                    indices.append((idx_name, idx_type, idx_cols))
544
545        # 其他选项
546        without_rowid = "WITHOUT ROWID" if kwargs.get("without_rowid", False) else ""
547
548        # 构建最终SQL
549        sql = (f"CREATE TABLE {f'IF NOT EXISTS ' if if_not_exists else ''}{safe_table} (\n"
550               f"  {',  '.join(column_defs)}\n"
551               f") {without_rowid}")
552
553        # SQLite不在CREATE TABLE中创建索引，需要额外的语句
554        index_sqls = []
555        for idx_name, idx_type, idx_cols in indices:
556            index_sqls.append(
557                f"CREATE {idx_type} INDEX IF NOT EXISTS {self.escape_identifier(idx_name)} "
558                f"ON {safe_table}({', '.join(idx_cols)})"
559            )
560
561        return sql, index_sqls
562
563    def build_drop_table(self,
564                         tablename: str,
565                         if_exists: bool = True) -> str:
566        """构建DROP TABLE语句"""
567        safe_table = self.escape_identifier(tablename)
568        return f"DROP TABLE {f'IF EXISTS ' if if_exists else ''}{safe_table}"
569
570    def build_join(self,
571                   main_table: str,
572                   joins: List[Tuple[str, str, JoinType, Dict[str, str]]],
573                   fields: Optional[Dict[str, List[str]]] = None,
574                   conditions: Optional[Dict] = None,
575                   order: Optional[Dict[str, bool]] = None,
576                   limit: Optional[int] = None,
577                   offset: Optional[int] = None,
578                   **kwargs) -> Tuple[str, List]:
579        """构建连接查询语句"""
580        # 处理主表
581        safe_main_table = self.escape_identifier(main_table)
582        main_alias = kwargs.get("main_alias", "t0")
583        from_clause = f"{safe_main_table} AS {main_alias}"
584
585        # 处理连接
586        join_clauses = []
587        join_params = []
588        for i, (table, alias, join_type, join_conds) in enumerate(joins, 1):
589            safe_table = self.escape_identifier(table)
590            join_conditions = []
591
592            # 构建连接条件
593            for main_col, join_col in join_conds.items():
594                main_table_prefix = kwargs.get("main_alias", "t0")
595                join_conditions.append(
596                    f"{main_table_prefix}.{self.escape_identifier(main_col)} = {alias}.{self.escape_identifier(join_col)}"
597                )
598
599            join_clause = f"{join_type.value} {safe_table} AS {alias} ON {' AND '.join(join_conditions)}"
600            join_clauses.append(join_clause)
601
602        # 处理字段选择
603        select_fields = []
604        if fields:
605            for table_alias, cols in fields.items():
606                for col in cols:
607                    select_fields.append(f"{table_alias}.{self.escape_identifier(col)} AS {table_alias}_{col}")
608        else:
609            # 默认选择所有字段
610            select_fields.append(f"{main_alias}.*")
611            for _, alias, _, _ in joins:
612                select_fields.append(f"{alias}.*")
613
614        # 构建基础查询
615        sql = f"SELECT {', '.join(select_fields)} FROM {from_clause} {' '.join(join_clauses)}"
616        params = join_params.copy()
617
618        # 处理WHERE条件
619        if conditions:
620            # 需要特殊处理条件，因为它们可能引用表别名
621            where_clause, where_params = self._build_where_clause(conditions)
622            if where_clause:
623                sql += f" WHERE {where_clause}"
624                params.extend(where_params)
625
626        # 处理排序
627        if order:
628            order_parts = []
629            for col, asc in order.items():
630                direction = "ASC" if asc else "DESC"
631                # 检查是否包含表别名
632                if "." in col:
633                    order_parts.append(f"{col} {direction}")
634                else:
635                    # 假设是主表字段
636                    order_parts.append(f"{main_alias}.{self.escape_identifier(col)} {direction}")
637
638            if order_parts:
639                sql += f" ORDER BY {', '.join(order_parts)}"
640
641        # 处理分页
642        if limit is not None:
643            sql += f" LIMIT ?"
644            params.append(int(limit))
645            if offset is not None:
646                sql += f" OFFSET ?"
647                params.append(int(offset))
648
649        return sql, params

def build_insert( self, tablename: str, data: Union[Dict[str, Any], List[Dict[str, Any]]], **kwargs) -> Tuple[str, List]: 
367    def build_insert(self,
368                     tablename: str,
369                     data: Union[Dict[str, Any], List[Dict[str, Any]]],
370                     **kwargs) -> Tuple[str, List]:
371        """构建INSERT语句"""
372        safe_table = self.escape_identifier(tablename)
373
374        # 处理单行或多行插入
375        is_batch = isinstance(data, list)
376        records = data if is_batch else [data]
377        if not records:
378            raise ValueError("没有数据可插入")
379
380        # 获取所有字段名
381        fields = list(records[0].keys())
382        safe_fields = [self.escape_identifier(field) for field in fields]
383        fields_str = ", ".join(safe_fields)
384
385        # 构建占位符
386        values_placeholder = "(" + ", ".join(["?"] * len(fields)) + ")"
387
388        # 构建批量插入的值
389        values = []
390        for record in records:
391            record_values = [record.get(field) for field in fields]
392            values.extend(record_values)
393
394        # 处理插入选项
395        ignore = kwargs.get("ignore", False)
396        conflict_action = kwargs.get("conflict_action", "ABORT")
397        conflict_columns = kwargs.get("conflict_columns", [])
398
399        # 构建SQL (SQLite 使用 INSERT OR 语法)
400        if ignore:
401            conflict_action = "IGNORE"
402
403        sql = f"INSERT OR {conflict_action} INTO {safe_table} ({fields_str}) VALUES "
404
405        if is_batch:
406            # SQLite不支持多行语法，需要返回多个语句
407            placeholders = []
408            for i in range(len(records)):
409                placeholders.append(values_placeholder)
410
411            sql += values_placeholder
412
413            # 如果是批量插入，我们需要单独处理每个INSERT
414            # 返回单条SQL和所有值，在上层函数中处理实际的批量执行
415
416        else:
417            sql += values_placeholder
418
419        # SQLite ON CONFLICT 子句 (类似于MySQL的ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE)
420        if conflict_columns and kwargs.get("update_on_conflict") and not ignore:
421            update_values = kwargs.get("update_values", {})
422            if update_values:
423                conflict_fields = ", ".join([self.escape_identifier(col) for col in conflict_columns])
424                update_parts = []
425                for field, value in update_values.items():
426                    update_parts.append(f"{self.escape_identifier(field)} = ?")
427                    values.append(value)
428                sql += f" ON CONFLICT({conflict_fields}) DO UPDATE SET {', '.join(update_parts)}"
429
430        return sql, values
